Job Title: Senior Creative Copywriter

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
With Confluent, organizations can harness the full power of continuously flowing data to innovate and win in the modern digital world. We have a purpose that drives us to do better every day -- we're creating an entirely new category within data infrastructure - data streaming. This technology will allow every organization to create experiences and use the power of data in ways that profoundly impact the way we all live. This impact is our purpose and drives us to do better every day.

One Confluent. One team. One Data Streaming Platform.

Data Connects Us.

About The Role

 Confluent is looking for a Senior Creative Copywriter who is creative, self-motivated, and organized. This individual should be capable of managing multiple active projects while collaborating with stakeholders across various teams. We highly value team players who are intelligent, humble, and empathetic. These individuals uplift and inspire those around them, understanding that our collective impact is most significant when we work together. 

 As a Senior Creative Copywriter at Confluent, you should have a strong portfolio of unique, high-impact marketing campaigns. You'll work closely with the Creative Art Director and other team members, including designers, product marketers, campaign managers, and strategic marketers, to elevate the Confluent brand. 

What You Will Do

Create engaging, creative, and impactful ad copy that resonates within our industryDevelop effective creative marketing campaigns across various touchpointsContribute to the evolution of Confluentâ€™s brand strategy, brand guidelines, style guide, and content typologyCollaborate with strategic marketing planners, campaign managers, designers, and digital producers to develop concepts and assets that engage usersAct as a strategic advisor to senior marketers and client service practitioners by clarifying business objectives, defining key messages, and differentiating ConfluentPresent creative concepts and copy to internal teams and clients, managing client revisions and reviewsRecommend new creative channels, technologies, approaches, or assets for campaignsParticipate in the Creative Development team by joining internal task forces and strategic initiatives

What You Will Bring

5-8 years of experience writing and producing a wide range of marketing communication assetsA strategic and conceptual mindset with the ability to balance innovative approaches with business objectivesTo be receptive to constructive criticism on creative initiativesSelfless and possesses a firm understanding of teamworkClear, concise writing skills to distill complex ideas into easily understood languageThe ability to manage multiple projects with minimal oversightCapability to interact with senior stakeholders and highly intellectual thinkersStrong editing and proofreading skillsA Bachelor's degree in Writing, English, Journalism, Marketing, Communications, or a related discipline

Come As You Are

At Confluent, equality is a core tenet of our culture. We are committed to building an inclusive global team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences. The more diverse we are, the richer our community and the broader our impact. Employment decisions are made on the basis of job-related criteria without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other classification protected by applicable law.

At Confluent, we are committed to providing competitive pay and benefits that are in line with industry standards. We analyze and carefully consider several factors when determining compensation, including work history, education, professional experience, and location. This position has an annual estimated salary of $135,900 - $159,660, an annual bonus, and a competitive equity package. The actual pay may vary depending on your skills, qualifications, experience, and work location. In addition, Confluent offers a wide range of employee benefits. To learn more about our benefits click HERE .

Click HERE to review our Candidate Privacy Notice which describes how and when Confluent, Inc., and its group companies, collects, uses, and shares certain personal information of California job applicants and prospective employees.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
